title: Georgia House - Day 5 (2026-12-05)
summary:
Overview: The Georgia House session included a special announcement about a new baby born to a representative, as well as an opening prayer and hymn led by a guest chaplain from Loganville.

Key Actions:
**SB1**: No action taken

Bills Introduced (First Reading): None noted

Notable Moments:
- Introduction and prayer by Rev. Calvin L. Mapp, pastor of Morningstar Baptist Church in Loganville
- Rev. Mapp led the House in singing the hymn "Give Me That Old Time Religion"
- Rep. Ray Martinez introduced Rev. Mapp and praised his work in the Loganville community

Votes: None recorded

Attendance: Quorum present 

Adjournment: No specific adjournment time noted. Next session scheduled for 2026-12-06.
